name: It's Christmas Eve and You Still Haven't Prepared for the Party
name_original: It's Christmas Eve and You Still Haven't Prepared for the Party
description:
As stated so vividly in it's title,  It's Christmas Eve and You Still Haven't Prepared for the Party is a game in which it's Christmas Eve and you still haven't prepared for the party. Therefore, you must now prepare for the party.

This is a first person point-and-click adventure game. Explore the house and find the things you need to make this place ready for Christmas! Controls are listed in the main menu.

Note: concerning the credits, I forgot to mention that the sky was made in Paint.net, not Blender.

Have fun, and Merry Christmas!
